data.deskripsi_posisi: Lingkup kerja IT Development mencakup perancangan, pengembangan, pengujian, dan pemeliharaan sistem atau aplikasi berbasis teknologi. Tim IT Development bertanggung jawab memastikan perangkat lunak berfungsi optimal, aman, dan sesuai kebutuhan pengguna. Selain itu, mencakup analisis kebutuhan, integrasi sistem, pengelolaan basis data, serta penerapan teknologi baru untuk meningkatkan efisiensi dan kualitas layanan organisasi.

perusahaan.alamat: Bakrie Tower Lantai 18, JL. Epicentrum Utama Raya No. 2

data.deskripsi_posisi:
Silahkan mendaftar di link berikut agar dapat diproses lebih lanjut: https://bit.ly/magangnasional2025

Gambaran jobdesc (akan disesuaikan dengan unit kerja penemaptan):
- membantu tim bisnis menganalisa data terakit menganalisis dataset merchant, mengidentifikasi tren, dan menuangkannya ke dalam laporan serta visualisasi yang mudah dipahami dan bermanfaat.
- Mereview flow penerimaan tagihan yang masuk pada loket
- Menganalisa, mengolah dan menyajikannya dalam bentuk laporan/dashboard 

Kualifikasi:
- IPK min 3
- mampu menggunakan aplikasi Microsoft Excel, PPT/Canva.

Technical:
路 Kemampuan analitis dan numerik.
路 Penguasaan Microsoft Excel (pivot table, vlookup, chart) adalah WAJIB.
路 Kemampuan menulis laporan yang terstruktur dan jelas.

Soft Skills:
路 Curiosity (Rasa Ingin Tahu): Senang menggali "mengapa" di balik sebuah tren data.
路 Problem Solving: Memandang data sebagai alat untuk memecahkan masalah.
路 Attention to Detail: Teliti dalam mengolah data untuk meminimalisir kesalahan.
路 Communication: Mampu menjelaskan temuan data yang kompleks dengan bahasa yang sederhana.

data.deskripsi_posisi:
Membantu tim Quality Engineering dalam melakukan monitoring dan analisis data kualitas produk di proses produksi.
Mendukung kegiatan problem solving terkait temuan kualitas (misalnya: defect analysis, root cause analysis, corrective & preventive action).
Membantu dalam penyusunan dan pembaruan dokumen mutu, seperti Control Plan, Inspection Standard, Check Sheet, dan Work Instruction.
Mendukung kegiatan quality improvement seperti Kaizen, 5S, dan penerapan Lean Manufacturing.
Membantu pelaksanaan dan dokumentasi kegiatan audit internal dan supplier quality check.
Mengumpulkan dan mengolah data hasil inspeksi menggunakan Microsoft Excel atau software QC tools.
Membantu pembuatan laporan performa kualitas (Quality Report) mingguan atau bulanan.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim Produksi, Engineering, dan Maintenance untuk menjaga konsistensi kualitas produk.

perusahaan.alamat: Plaza Asia/Abda LT. 26 Jl. Jend. Sudirman Kav. 59 Kel. Senayan Kec. Kebayoran Baru Kota Administrasi Jakarta Selatan DKI Jakarta

data.deskripsi_posisi:
Membantu tim Engineering dalam melakukan perencanaan, pengujian, dan evaluasi proses produksi.
Mendukung kegiatan layout improvement, process flow analysis, dan line balancing di area produksi.
Membantu pembuatan dan pembaruan Standard Operating Procedure (SOP), Work Instruction, dan Process Sheet.
Mengumpulkan, mengolah, dan menganalisis data produktivitas, efisiensi mesin, serta waktu kerja (time study).
Mendukung implementasi Kaizen, 5S, TPM (Total Productive Maintenance), dan aktivitas continuous improvement.
Membantu dalam perancangan jig, fixture, atau alat bantu kerja sederhana menggunakan software CAD (bila relevan).
Mendukung kegiatan trial produk baru dan memastikan kesiapan peralatan serta proses produksi.
Membuat laporan hasil kegiatan atau proyek magang secara berkala kepada supervisor/mentor

perusahaan.alamat: Plaza Asia/Abda LT. 26 Jl. Jend. Sudirman Kav. 59 Kel. Senayan Kec. Kebayoran Baru Kota Administrasi Jakarta Selatan DKI Jakarta

data.deskripsi_posisi:
Membantu tim IT dalam pemeliharaan perangkat keras (hardware) seperti komputer, printer, dan perangkat jaringan.
Mendukung kegiatan troubleshooting software dan sistem bagi karyawan di area kantor maupun produksi.
Membantu dalam pengelolaan jaringan komputer (LAN/Wi-Fi), termasuk pemantauan koneksi dan konfigurasi dasar.
Mendukung implementasi dan pembaruan sistem ERP / database internal perusahaan.
Membantu pembuatan dan pembaruan dokumentasi sistem IT, seperti panduan pengguna dan inventaris perangkat IT.
Membantu tim dalam pengembangan aplikasi sederhana (misalnya dashboard, sistem monitoring, atau form digital).
Mendukung pengaturan akses keamanan data dan akun pengguna (user access management).
Membantu pelaksanaan backup data rutin dan memastikan keamanan informasi sesuai kebijakan perusahaan.
Membuat laporan hasil kegiatan magang dan memberikan ide atau rekomendasi perbaikan sistem IT.

perusahaan.alamat: Plaza Asia/Abda LT. 26 Jl. Jend. Sudirman Kav. 59 Kel. Senayan Kec. Kebayoran Baru Kota Administrasi Jakarta Selatan DKI Jakarta

data.deskripsi_posisi:
- Membantu proses editing video untuk program televisi, seperti talk show, variety show, infotainment, berita, promosi, atau konten digital.
- Menggabungkan footage, audio, grafis, dan efek visual sesuai arahan producer atau creative team.
- Membantu pemilihan dan pemotongan footage (logging & trimming) agar hasil video efisien dan menarik.
- Menyesuaikan tone warna (color correction) dan audio dasar (sound leveling) agar sesuai standar broadcast.
- Menambahkan teks, bumper, dan lower third sesuai kebutuhan program.
- Membantu output dan konversi format video untuk tayangan TV maupun platform digital.
- Berkoordinasi dengan tim kreatif dan produksi untuk memastikan hasil akhir sesuai konsep dan durasi.
- Mengarsipkan dan menata file hasil editing dalam sistem penyimpanan media perusahaan.

data.deskripsi_posisi:
Tanggung Jawab Utama
1. Memberikan informasi lengkap dan akurat mengenai proyek perumahan kepada calon konsumen.
2. Mencapai target penjualan bulanan dan tahunan yang telah ditetapkan perusahaan.
3. Menghasilkan prospek penjualan melalui media sosial, telepon, email, dan pertemuan langsung.
4. Memelihara dan mengelola database konsumen melalui sistem CRM (Consumer Relationship Management).
5. Melakukan pertemuan tatap muka atau presentasi online untuk mendukung proses penjualan.
6. Mengidentifikasi tren pasar dan strategi penjualan kompetitor.
7.  Menyusun rencana dan strategi penjualan secara berkala.
8. Menyusun laporan penjualan mingguan/bulanan yang akurat dan terukur.
9. Menjalin dan menjaga hubungan baik dengan klien baru maupun eksisting.
10. Berpartisipasi aktif dalam kegiatan promosi perusahaan seperti open house, launching proyek, pameran, dan event marketing lainnya.

data.deskripsi_posisi:
Administration
1.	To assist in overseeing the preparation and update of the Departmental Operations Manual.
2.	To conduct regular communications meetings and ensure that departmental briefings and meetings are effective and conducted as necessary.

Customer Service
1.    To deliver the brand promise and provide exceptional guest service at all times.
2.	  To provide excellent service to internal customers as appropriate.

Financial
1.	To maximise employee productivity through the use of multi-skilling, multi-tasking and flexible scheduling to meet the financial goals of the business as well as the expectations of the guests.
2.	To ensure that the section in Department operates with the lowest possible cost structure while also delivering on the brand promise to the guest.
3.	To assist in proactively managing costs based on key performance indicators.
4.	To ensure that all relevant hotel, company and local rules, policies and regulations are adhered to.
5.	To assist in the inventory management and ongoing maintenance of hotel operating equipment and other assets.
6.	To assist with the input and oversight of product specifications, recipes and other data as required, supporting the smooth operation of Materials Management and Cost Audit functions.

Marketing
1.	To constantly evaluate local, national and international market trends, vendors and other hotel/restaurant operations to make sure that the hotels own operations remain competitive and cutting edge.
2.	To continuously explore ways to support outlets in creating products that help to maximise revenues and profits.
3.	To assist Food and Beverage Manager and Executive Chef in Marketing and Public Relations opportunities to increase awareness and ultimately business.

Operational
1.	To be familiar with all food items on the outlet menu.
2.	To prepare food products according to the standard required.
3.	To follow standard recipes and minimise waste to help ensure that the outlets food cost is in line with budget.
4.	To be flexible wherever possible in meeting special requests from guests for specific food preparation methods and ingredients.
5.	To follow presentation guidelines as established by the Chef de Partied, Sous Chef or Chef de Cuisine.
6.	To maintain the assigned station / section in a clean and orderly manner at all times.
7.	To ensure that all company minimum brand standards are implemented, and that optional brand standards are implemented where appropriate.
8.	To work in a supportive and flexible manner with other employees and other departments, in a spirit of We work through Teams.
9.	To be up to date with the availability of seasonal and new products on the market.
10.	To treat all operating equipment and supplies carefully to minimise damage and reduce wastage.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Systems / operations

1.	Adheres to guidelines as set in the personnel guide at all times
2.	Work in areas as designated by the Executive Chef and indicated on the rotating roster
3.	Arrives to work station in full clean chefs attire including chefs hat which is worn at all times whilst on duty and including sanitation gloves whilst handling food
4.	Handles equipment with high regard for safety at all times
5.	Follows the standards and procedures as outlined by the chef and never strays front these unless directed by the chef
6.	Stores food and other item hygienically  and safety at all times to ensure there is never any chance that staff will receive contaminated food
7.	Gives responsive, friendly service to all  customer  (service staff ) so as to ensure that their customers receive the same style of service
8.	Prepares mise - en - place as directed by the Chef de Partie accurately and in timely fashion to ensure that the kitchen is ready prior to the service period
9.	Knows the recipes and method of cooking of each menu item exactly to the recipe without any deviation unless requested on the order, and displayed as per plate presentation photograph
10.	Assists steward as required to complete important cleaning duties
11.	Prepares and cooks food on the buffet as directed and participates in guest contact and conversation
12.	Keeps work station hygienically clean at all times whilst practicing correct cleaning techniques and wearing sanitation gloves while preparing all food
13.	At all times understands, practice and promote the teamwork approach to achieve mission , goal and overall departmental standards
14.	Prepares food ordered by the waiter in a timely and correct manner to ensure a high degree of guest satisfaction
15.	Completes routine assigned closing duties that ensure the hand over to the next shift smooth and in a team spirit
16.	Completes other reasonable duties as outlined by the chef.


Personnel
1.	To oversee the punctuality and appearance, making sure that they wear the correct uniform and maintain a high standard of personal appearance and hygiene, according to the hotel and departments grooming standards.
2.	To develop the skills and effectiveness team Leaders through the appropriate training, coaching, and/or mentoring.
3.	To conduct annual Performance Development Discussions with pastry and bakery employees, to support them in their professional development goals.
4.	To plan and implement effective training programmes for all pastry and bakery employees in coordination with the Training Manager and Departmental Trainers.
5.	To assist in the development of Departmental Trainers through ongoing feedback and monthly meetings.
6.	To prepare and post weekly work schedules, making sure that they reflect business needs and other key performance indicators.
7.	To ensure that employees have a complete understanding of and adhere to employee rules and regulations.
8.	To ensure that employees follow all hotel, company and local rules, policies and regulations relating to fire and hazard safety, and security.
9.	To feedback the results of the Employee Opinion Survey and to ensure that the relevant changes are implemented.

Staff / Training
1.	Learns service skills through on - the - job training
2.	Attends behavioural training in own and related work areas to enhance skills and develop multifunctionality
3.	Shares his skills and knowledge with all the employees


Shared values 
1.	Ensures effective implementation of the following code of conduct at all time
2.	Conduct which is of highest ethical standards - intellectual, financial & moral
3.	Conduct which builds and maintains Team work, with mutual trust as the basis of all working relationship
4.	Conduct which puts the customer first, the company second and self last
5.	Conduct hich exemplifies care for the customer through anticipation of need attention to detail, excellent and style and respect for privacy along with warmth and concern
6.	Conduct which demonstrates two - way communication accepting constructive debate and dissent whilst acting fearlessly with conviction
7.	Conduct, which demonstrates with people, is our key asset, through respect for every employee and leading from the front regarding performance achievement as well as individual development
8.	Conduct T which at all times safeguards the safety, security, health and environment of customers, employees and the assets of the company
9.	Conduct which eschews the sort - term quick fix the long-term establishment of healthy precedent 


KEY PERFORMANCE MEASURES

Measurable
1.	Hygiene inspection and grading
2.	Individual productivity
3.	Customer satisfaction index
4.	Employee motivational index
5.	Efficiency in performing job task
6.	Attendance and punctuality
7.	Man days of training attended

Non - measurable
1.	Level of support to team leaders
2.	Going beyond the call of duty to satisfy guest needs
3.	Multifunctionality
4.	Self motivation
5.	Positive attitude
6.	Personal grooming and etiquette
Other Duties
1.	To report for duty punctually wearing the correct uniform and name tag.
2.	To maintain a high standard of personal appearance and hygiene and adhere to the hotel and department grooming standards.
3.	To provide friendly, courteous and professional service at all times.
4.	To maintain good working relationships with colleagues and all other departments.
5.	To read the hotels Employee Handbook and have an understanding of and adhere to the hotels rules and regulations and in particular, the policies and procedures relating to Fire, Hygiene, Health and Safety.
6.	To comply with local legislation as required.
7.	To respond to any changes in the department as dictated by the needs of the hotel.
8.	To be flexible in your job function and perform any other reasonable duties and responsibilities which may be assigned to you, including redeployment to other departments/areas if required, in order to meet business demands and guest service needs.
9.	To attend training sessions and meetings as and when required.

IMPORTANT ORGANIZATIONAL RELATIONSHIPS

Superior
	Report to Chef de partied

Other Departments
	Maintains cordial & friendly relationship with all the staff in the department
	Coordinates functions and activities with other Food and Beverage staff
	Maintains close relationship with F&B service teams for smooth operations

Customers and Outsiders
	Assist the Sous Chef / Chef de Partied investigation, complaints and rectifying procedures and standards based on customer feedback in his/her kitchen area
	Maintains cordial relationship with all internal customers

Subordinates and peers
	Maintains professional working relationship with internal customers

perusahaan.alamat: ASTON RASUNA RESIDENCE,KOMP APARTEMEN TMN RASUNA,JL HR RASUNA SAID

data.deskripsi_posisi:
SUMMARY
1.	To provide all guests with courteous, professional, efficient and flexible service that supports the outlets operating concept, brand promise
2.	To handle all guest and internal customer, complaints and inquiries in a courteous and efficient manner, following through to make sure problems are resolved satisfactorily.
3.	Take orders and serve food and beverages to patrons at tables in dining establishment. Check with customers to ensure that they are enjoying their meals and take action to correct any problems. Communicate with customers to resolve complaints or ensure satisfaction.
4.	To be flexible in your job function and perform any other reasonable duties and responsibilities which may be assigned to you, in order to meet business demands and guest service needs.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
1.	To ensure that all company minimum brand standards have been implemented, and that optional brand standards have been implemented where appropriate.
2.	To constantly interacts with all guests in assigned station and actively seeks guest feedback, fosters professional/ friendly relationship with all guests.
3.	Greet and escort customers to their tables.
4.	Present menu and provide detailed information when asked (e.g. about portions, ingredients or potential food allergies).
5.	Prepare tables by setting up linens, silverware and glasses.
6.	Prepare tables by setting up linens, silverware and glasses.
7.	Offer menu recommendations upon request.
8.	Up-sell additional products when appropriate
9.	Take accurate food and drinks orders, using a POS ordering software, order  slips or by memorization
10.	To ensure that employees follow all hotel, company and local rules, policies and regulations relating to fire and hazard safety, and security.
11.	To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of and adhere to employee rules and regulations.
12.	To make sure that all employees are up to date with the availability of seasonal and new products on the market.
13.	To taste and monitor the food and beverage products served throughout the operation, providing feedback where appropriate.

COMPETENCIES REQUIRED
1.	 To have a well-groomed appearance, a pleasing demeanor.
2.	 Ability to communicate with customers and staff clearly and fluently.
3.	 Pleasant personality and ability to maintain good relations with a variety of people
4.	 High service orientation
5.	 Hands-on experience with cash register and ordering information system ( POS )
6.	 To have flexibility to work in shift

SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE REQUIREMENTS
1.	Customer-Service: Waiter/ss might have to interact with customers. Being friendly and courteous will help keep customers coming back.
2.	Attentiveness and patience for customers
3.	Strong organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment.
4.	Must be of legal age to serve alcoholic beverages (May vary by state)
5.	Must be able to work in a team environment.
6.	Must have the good physical abilities to carry out the functions of the job description.
7.	Must know all food liquor, beer, wine and retail offered
8.	Familiar with the importance of sanitation including foodborne illness, personal cleanliness and health procedure for safe food handling, cleanup, and accident prevention.
9.	Ability to work with all personality types even in adverse situations

perusahaan.alamat: ASTON RASUNA RESIDENCE,KOMP APARTEMEN TMN RASUNA,JL HR RASUNA SAID
